meta_title: What is 5S Methodology? Definition and Core Principles
meta_description: 5S methodology is a Lean framework for workplace organization. Understand the five pillars—Sort, Set, Shine, Standardize, Sustain—to improve efficiency.
title: What is 5S Methodology?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What is 5S Methodology?

image_prompt: A wide-angle, photo-realistic shot of a modern, high-tech industrial workshop. The floor is impeccably clean with clear yellow safety markings. Tools are perfectly organized on a digital shadow board. A diverse pair of technicians in professional PPE and high-visibility vests are collaborating, one holding a sleek industrial tablet showing a checklist. The lighting is bright and professional, emphasizing a sense of order, efficiency, and advanced technology. No text.
